DOC.brief_title: Proof Concept Study With Endothelin Receptor B Inhibitor ( BQ-788 ) Human Melanoma
DOC.criteria: Written Informed consent Histologically confirm melanoma Disease stage III IV At least 2 injectable surgically removable cutaneous metastasis Age > 18 year Clinically stable medical condition Primary ocular melanoma Symptomatic intracranial melanoma History severe neurological , cardiovascular , renal , hepatic , endocrinological , respiratory , bone marrow , autoimmune infectious ( HIV ) disease Pregnancy lactation
